meanings.definition: A univalent hydrocarbon radical, C2H, derived from acetylene.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the ethynyl compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Chemists use ethynyl in various chemical reactions.
meanings.sent3: The ethynyl group decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like an ethynyl spark in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of ethynyl made it easy to identify in the mixture.
